sentences: Lapsed tahavad liiga palju arvutis mängima.
context: The Estonian word 'arvuti' means 'computer' in English. It is a noun derived from the verb 'arvutama' (to calculate, compute) + the suffix '-i'. This word refers to any electronic device for processing digitally presented information, including desktop computers, laptops, and even calculators in some contexts. The word follows Estonian grammar with various case forms such as arvutit (partitive), arvutisse (illative), arvutis (inessive), etc.
